response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. This product, which I believe is worth more than $1,000,000 to you, has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled benefits. I am extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase this item at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a substantial advantage over the market value while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
